00050         typedef struct tSDL_vnc_pixelFormat {
00051                 unsigned char bpp;
00052                 unsigned char depth;
00053                 unsigned char bigendian;
00054                 unsigned char truecolor;
00055                 unsigned short redmax;
00056                 unsigned short greenmax;
00057                 unsigned short bluemax;
00058                 unsigned char redshift;
00059                 unsigned char greenshift;
00060                 unsigned char blueshift;
00061                 unsigned char padding[3];
00062         } tSDL_vnc_pixelFormat;
00063         
00064         typedef struct tSDL_vnc_serverFormat {
00065                 unsigned short width;
00066                 unsigned short height;
00067                 tSDL_vnc_pixelFormat pixel_format;
00068                 unsigned int namelength;
00069                 char name[VNC_BUFSIZE];
00070         } tSDL_vnc_serverFormat;

00185         /* ---- main SDL_vnc structure ---- */
00186 
00187         typedef struct tSDL_vnc {
00188                 int socket;                             // socket to server
00189                 int versionMajor;                               // current VNC version
00190                 int versionMinor;                               // current VNC version
00191                 unsigned int security_type;             // current security type
00192                 tSDL_vnc_serverFormat serverFormat;     // current server format
00193                 tSDL_vnc_updateRequest updateRequest;   // standard update request for full screen 
00194                 
00195                 int reading;                            // flag indicating we are reading
00196                 int framerate;                          // current framerate for update requests
00197                 int delay;                                      // Throttle down main thread (power saving)
00198                 
00199                 Uint32 rmask, gmask, bmask, amask;      // current RGBA mask
00200                 
00201                 
00202                 SDL_Thread *thread;                     // VNC client thread
00203                 SDL_mutex *mutex;                       // thread mutex
00204                 
00205                 // Variables below are accessed by the Thread
00206                 // and need to be mutex locked if accessed externally
00207                 
00208                 char *buffer;                           // general IO buffer
00209                 
00210                 char *clientbuffer;                     // buffer for client-to-server data
00211                 int clientbufferpos;                    // current position in buffer
00212                 
00213                 int fbupdated;                          // flag indicating that the framebuffer was updated
00214                 SDL_Rect updatedRect;                   // rectangle that was updated
00215                 
00216                 SDL_Surface *framebuffer;               // RGB surface of framebuffer
00217                 SDL_Surface *scratchbuffer;             // workbuffer for encodings
00218                 SDL_Surface *tilebuffer;                // workbuffer for encodings
00219                 
00220                 int gotcursor;                          // flag indicating that the cursor was updated
00221                 SDL_Surface *cursorbuffer;              // RGBA surface of cursor (fixed at 32x32)
00222                 SDL_Rect cursorhotspot;                 // hotspot location of cursor (only .x and .y are used)
00223                 
00224         } tSDL_vnc;

00231 #if defined(WIN32) || defined(WIN64)
00232 #  if defined(BUILD_DLL) && !defined(LIBSDL_VNC_DLL_IMPORT)
00233 #    define SDL_VNC_SCOPE __declspec(dllexport)
00234 #  else
00235 #    ifdef LIBSDL_VNC_DLL_IMPORT
00236 #      define SDL_VNC_SCOPE __declspec(dllimport)
00237 #    endif
00238 #  endif
00239 #endif
00240 #ifndef SDL_VNC_SCOPE
00241 #  define SDL_VNC_SCOPE extern

00244 
00245 
00246 /* 
00247         Connect to VNC server 
00248 
00249         vnc  = pointer to tSDL_vnc structure
00250         host = hostname or hostip
00251         port = port
00252         mode = submode,submode,...
00253         submode =       raw | 
00254         copyrect | 
00255         rre | 
00256         corre(broken) |
00257         hextile | 
00258         zrle(unimplemented) | 
00259         cursor(ignored) | 
00260         desktop(ignored)
00261         password = text
00262         framerate = 1 to 100
00263 
00264         */
00265 
00266         SDL_VNC_SCOPE int vncConnect(tSDL_vnc *vnc, char *host, int port, char *mode, char *password, int framerate);
00267 
00268 
00269 
00270         /* 
00271         Blit current framebuffer to target
00272 
00273         Only blits if framebuffer exists and was updated. 
00274         Updated region is stored in urec (if not NULL).
00275 
00276         Returns 1 if the blit occured, 0 otherwise.
00277         */
00278 
00279         SDL_VNC_SCOPE int vncBlitFramebuffer(tSDL_vnc *vnc, SDL_Surface *target, SDL_Rect *urec);
00280         SDL_VNC_SCOPE int vncBlitFramebufferAdvanced(tSDL_vnc *vnc, SDL_Surface *target, SDL_Rect *urec, int outx, int outy, float outScale, int fullRefresh);
00281 
00282         /*
00283         Blit current cursor to target
00284         
00285         Blitting is at the actual the cursor position.
00286         Returns 1 if blit occured, 0 otherwise 
00287         */
00288 
00289         SDL_VNC_SCOPE int vncBlitCursor(tSDL_vnc *vnc, SDL_Surface *target, SDL_Rect *trec);

00299         SDL_VNC_SCOPE SDL_Rect vncCursorHotspot(tSDL_vnc *vnc);
